alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 5:40PM EDT until April 11 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Gaylordsville. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Flood stage. Water reaches New Milford Foundry and Youngfield Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 8.3 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Fri 5 pm: 7.7 Forecast: Fri 8 pm 7.8 Sat 2 am 8.0 Sat 8 am 8.1 Sat 2 pm 8.2 Sat 8 pm 8.3 Sun 2 am 8.3 Sun 8 am 8.3 Sun 2 pm 8.1 Sun 8 pm 8.0 Mon 2 am 7.8 Mon 8 am 7.6 Mon 2 pm MSG &&
